item.description:
Hola Spanish Fanáticos!!!!

Tu hablas español bien. Tu hablas español asi asi. Tu hablas español poquito. Join us once again for a general Spanish Conversation workshop event in which you will be grouped by level in order to practice with your conversational skills while enjoying coffee or any tasty sandwich.

This event will start a 7pm sharp and end at 9pm.

Schedule of this event is as follows:

7:00 pm: Welcome and informal introductions and mingling; participants approach the counter to purchase their favorite drink and/or food; participants enjoy their drinks and/or food
7:30 pm: Participants are grouped by level (beginner, intermediate and advanced)
7:45pm: Participants find their group peers and start talking about topics of interest
8:45pm: Participants mingle with people from other groups
9:00pm: Event ends


Participants will be asked to change partners every 10 minutes from 7:45pm to 8:45pm so that they get to know and practice with each other.

Some suggest topics of discussion include:

Intermediate Conversational Spanish

- Cine
- Libro favorito
- Latino America
- ...

Advanced Conversational Spanish

- Calentamiento global
- Derechos humanos
- Recursos naturales
- ...


This workshop will be moderated by Marilyn, Assistant Organizer and Spanish tutor at Spanish Black Belt, leading Spanish language school servicing Boston MA. Please consult your tutor and moderator about any doubts that you may run into while talking with other participants.


This is an event organized by SpanishBlackBelt. A small Meetup fee will be charged to RSVP so that we can ensure a proper headcount and cover administrative costs. Space is limited to 20 participants so please sign up on-line through our secure Meetup page quickly enough to secure a seat. Payment will not be accepted at the door. Refunds can be granted ONLY if requested 5 days prior to event's date.

Please remember to buy something to support this venue so that we can continue meeting here. Sandwiches are amazing at this cafe.



If you cannot make it to this workshop, or would prefer to attend a more regular class, please click here to access all Small Group sessions currently being offered by Spanish Black Belt.
